__TOC__

* Regular <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/IrishTeam/IRCMeetings/2011-10-19|Monthly IRC Meeting]]</nowiki> was held at the new time of 9pm Irish time on Wednesday the 19^th^ of October, 2011.

* To celebrate the release of Oneiric Ocelot (Ubuntu 11:10) on Saturday 15 Oct 11 we <nowiki>[[http://loco.ubuntu.com/events/ubuntu-ie/1278/detail/|went for a bite to eat]]</nowiki> and then continued the celebrations at a nearby bar.  Some photos <nowiki>[[http://pix.ie/ubuntuie/album/424314/|here]]</nowiki>.

* <nowiki>[[http://loco.ubuntu.com/events/ubuntu-ie/1321/detail/|Ubuntu Hour Dublin]]</nowiki> returned with a new day, time and venue on 23^rd^ of October, 2011.
